Nightshift looks to Nightlight with a friendly smile.  He was happy to see =
that Nightlight remembered who he was.  He had also been concerned for her =
safety as were the others.

" And I'd go through it again too, if I had ta.=
  It's real nice ta have ya back.  I just wish we knew what Hydras weakness=
 is.  The problem is that guy's got too many sets of eyes on 'em and in his=
 alt form... Wait Thats it, why didn't I think of this before?  Nightlight,=
 I get it now.  I bet that if he lost all visual capabilities, Hydras would=
 be severely compromised.  On the other hand, Tucson lost the last fight be=
cause Hydras had 'em at a disadvantage.  But if Tucson took out all his vis=
ual circuitry, then he would have the upper hand.  Tucson's been blind a lo=
ng time, it's second nature ta him ta fight that way.  But it's not for Hyd=
ras. "

He turns his head over to Bump.

" How would we go about knock'n ou=
t Hydras visual circuitry?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
=

t
>> done anything that a CR chamber cannot fix. Don't worry, just lay back=

>> and rest, the machine will do all the work."
>>

GHTLIGHT as she spoke about the desire to only

>> out, "I can understand that. I=
 don't want to have to fight either,
>> just give me a lab and somehting to=
 work on and I am perfectly happy."

s he finished the activation sequence

et up as well."
